title: The Knights of Cawdor
description: Peace reigns at last in the lands of Elundium. Until rumors of a power-hungry group, the Chancellors, stir up old fears of cruelty and suffering. Determined to prevent a repeat of the past, the Elundium people band together to form a fighting force worthy of all they have attained--the Knights of Cawdor.
author: Mike Jefferies
